personalInfo.name: Zhou Bowen
personalInfo.title: Unity3D Developer & Technical Artist
personalInfo.bio:
Unity developer and hybrid generalist with a strong 3D art background. On the code side I focus on event-driven, data-driven systems in Unity and C# – using ScriptableObject-based data models, 
    state machines and decoupled services for gameplay, UI and AI – and I often build editor tools and small frameworks to simplify workflows and reduce repetitive work. Because I’ve done 3D modelling and texturing myself, I understand artists’ constraints and design pipelines and shaders that fit real production needs.

experience.description: Founded studio focused on 3D digital content. Coordinated client requirements and provided technical training in 3D tools. Shifted focus towards interactive media and Unity.
Produced assets for clients, optimized for real-time engines.
Designed interactive concepts and conducted technical training.
